cleaned_text: Homeopathic relief of discomforts in the lymphatic system, such as swollen lymph nodes and lymphatic edema. Hevert Detox Liver: Homeopathic medicine for the temporary relief of gallbladder and liver symptoms, such as bloating; pressure and pain in the upper abdomen; and constipation. Hevert Detox Kidney: Homeopathic medicine for the temporary relief of symptoms of urinary tract disorders, such as pain; burning sensation; frequent need to urinate; and urgent need to urinate. Hevert Detox Intestinum: Homeopathic medicine for the temporary relief of symptoms of upset stomach and indigestion, such as bloating; abdominal fullness; nausea, and constipation. Advantages for your patients include Synergistic homeopathic ingredients; may be taken along with conventional medicines; and drops for custom doing and easy application. Stimulate Regulation with the complete Hevert Detox Kit Note this product contains Lymph Stim plus other homeopathic, so it is designed to detox all the major detoxification systems. Adults and children over 12 years of age take 20 drops in water 3 X per day. Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age. Hevert Detox Lymph: do not use for children under 1 year of age. Hevert Detox Lymph: Active purified water. Suggested Usage: - Adults and children over 12 years of age: Take 20 drops in water 3 times daily. - Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age. - Hevert Detox Lymph: Do not use for children under 1 year of age. Warnings: Hevert® Detox Lymph: - Chronically enlarged lymph nodes can be a sign of different diseases. Therefore, consult a doctor in order to clarify the underlying disease before using this medicine. Also consult a doctor promptly in case of acute signs of inflammation (redness, heat, swelling, pain, and dysfunction) and fever or enlargement of the lymph nodes during treatment. - If you are pregnant, nursing, taking any medication, or have a medical condition, please consult your healthcare practitioner before taking any dietary supplement. - Do not use if you are allergic to Rhus Toxicodendron (poison ivy) or other plants from the cashew Hevert® Detox Liver: - Gallstones, occlusion of the bile ducts, jaundice, and any other unclear or persistent discomfort in the upper abdomen may be serious. Consult a doctor promptly if any of these symptoms occur. - Do not use if you are allergic to Taraxacum, Carduus marianus or other plants from the daisy family (Compositae) or you suffer from liver diseases - Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 7 days, worsen or new symptoms occur. Hevert® Detox Kidney: - Blood in urine, fever, nausea, vomiting, pain in the kidney area, or acute urinary retention may be serious. Consult a doctor promptly if any of these symptoms occur - Do not use if you are allergic to bee venom - Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 5 days, worsen or new symptoms occur. Hevert® Detox Intestinum: - Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 7 days, worsen or new symptoms occur. For oral use only. If pregnant or breastfeeding, ask a health professional before use. Keep out of reach of children. In case of accidental overdose, seek professional assistance or contact a poison control center immediately. Additional Information: Store at 68 to 77 °F Tamper Evident: Do not use if the tamper-evident strip is broken or missing from the base of the bottle cap.
